reviews.review_msg: This course was so fun! The lectures were great and the project was a lot of fun. I am not a linguistics major but I wish found this class earlier so I could take linguistics courses in my degree.

topic was indigenous languages in canada! eye-opening course and i enjoyed it, despite it not being something i'm wholeheartedly interested in. heather is very nice and approachable, her TA gave good feedback as well! stay on top of the weekly journals/assignments. lecture notes are extremely helpful with studying and following along! [spring 2022]
